title: Wife For Sale
description: Take an unhappy married couple with a small baby, a man whose wife died in a tragic accident and can’t let go, and you have a story of desperation, loneliness, betrayal and love.When Nicola died, Michael was desperately lonely. Then a year later, he spotted Mary, sitting on a park bench with her young son. She was a spitting image of his dead wife. Michael decided there and then he had to have her in his life. The events that followed took Michael, Mary and her husband John on a journey none of them expected. John’s greed changed all their lives forever.Wife for Sale is a story about relationships, marriage and love. It’s about how well we know the person next to us and the one we trust the most, and shows that keeping secrets leads to hurting the ones you love and ultimately, destroys ourselves. It is about discovering ourselves after being abandoned, lied to and hurt and teaches us how to find the power to forgive and forget so we can move on.
author: Tabita Gutu
